name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AliStore -- download product/store image & video from alibaba.com store

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click download of images and videos from product pages on Alibaba.com, as well as downloading store product images and videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avoid extracting all images from the entire page with other generic download extension, specifically for Alibaba.com. Easy one-click download, preview all product images/videos without being affected by other media files on the page.

ðŸ”¥ Features
âœ“ Simple operation  
âœ“ No registration required  
âœ“ Non-intrusive to the page, does not affect the page when not in use  

ðŸŽ¨ Functions
âœ“ Download high-definition images/videos of  products (main images/SKU/description images/videos)  
âœ“ One-click export of product image information in XLSX format  
âœ“ Supports downloading product images/videos from the store (images/videos), with filtering options by category/price range  
âœ“ Supports downloading product image information from the store, including the following fields:  
   - (Product ID, Product Subject, Category ID, Category, Product Link, Price From,Fob Price , Min Quantity, Image Links, Product Image Links, Video Link)  

ðŸš€ Usage:  
1. Single product image download/export: Open the product detail page, click the extension icon to preview and download/export product images/videos.  
2. Store product download/export: Open the store product list page, click the extension icon to get store categories, click [Accquire Store Data] to retrieve all store data, and then filter by price or category for download/export.  

ðŸ†• New Updates

ðŸ’´ Pro Subscription Version:  
- Basic Version: Supports one-click separate download/export of product variants or description images  
- Pro Version: Supports one-click download/export of all images  and Store product Data

ðŸ”’ Data Privacy  
User behavior data is processed on your local computer and never passes through our network servers. Server requests only determine if the user has purchased the Pro package.
